QuestionCN: 己知小天家、文具店、公园依次在同一条直线上,文具店离小天家0.6km'公园离小天家0.8k m -- 从家出发,先用了 8min 匀速步行去文具店:从文具店出来后接着匀速步行了3min到公园锻炼;从公园出 来后,接着用了 10min 匀速步行回到家,下面图中x表示时间,y表示离家的距离,图象反映了这个过程 中小天离家的距离与时间之间的对应关系 ↑ykm 0.8 0.6 15 o 8 2528 35, wi 58 68 xmm 请根据相关信息解答下列问题: (1)①填表: 58 小天离开家的时间 /min 1 8 15 0.6 小天离开家的距离 /km ②填空:小天从文具店到公园的速度为____ km/min: ③当 28≤x≤68 时,请直接写出小天离家的距离y关于时间x的函数解析式: C (2)当小天离开文具店30min时,小天的弟弟小津从公园出发匀速步行直接回家,如果小津的速度为 0.05km/min ,那么小津在回家的途中遇到小天时离家的距离是多少?(直接写出结果即可)
DescriptionCN:

2.有一个表格,第一行是小天离开家的时间/min,第二行是小天离开家的距离/km,表格中有部分空格;
DescriptionEN:
1. There is a function graph of x-y, where x represents time and y represents the distance from home, with polygonal lines at different stages in the graph;  
2. There is a table where the first row shows the time/min Xiaotian left home, and the second row shows the distance/km Xiaotian was from home, with some blank cells in the table.

QuestionCN: (1)如图1,在△ABC中,D为边AB上一点,E为边AC上一点,点CCABDE于点F,DE=EF,求AE与CE之(2)如图2,△ABC为等边三角形,D为边AC上一点,射线BD点B转60BE、射线BE与CA的延长线相交于点E,F为边AB上一点,CF与BD相交点M(FM)/(CM)=n,求CE,BC和BF之间的数量关系.(用含n的代数式表示)(3)在(2)的条件下,当AE=1/4AC,F为AB的中点时,将线段CF绕点C旋转得到线段CF′线段CF′与射线BD交于点M′若点F′到线段AC的距离为√2/2​​AC的长度,求F′M′/​CM′的值.
QuestionEN:
(1) As shown in Figure 1, in △ABC, point D lies on side AB, point E lies on side AC, and point CCABDE meets at point F. Given that DE = EF, find the ratio of AE to CE.  

(2) As shown in Figure 2, △ABC is an equilateral triangle, point D lies on side AC, and ray BD is rotated by 60° around point B to form ray BE. The extension of ray BE intersects the extension of CA at point E. Point F lies on side AB, and CF intersects BD at point M. Given that $\frac{FM}{CM} = n$, find the quantitative relationship among CE, BC, and BF (expressed in terms of n).  

(3) Under the conditions of (2), when $AE = \frac{1}{4}AC$ and F is the midpoint of AB, the line segment CF is rotated around point C to form line segment CF′. The line segment CF′ intersects the ray BD at point M′. If the distance from point F′ to line segment AC is $\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$ times the length of AC, find the value of $\frac{F′M′}{CM′}$.
DescriptionCN:
1.图1是一个△ABC,AB边上有一点D,AC边上有一点E,过点C作CF∥AB交射线DE于点F,且DE=EF
2.图2是一个等边△ABC,AC边上有一点D,有射线BD,射线BE与CA的延长线相交于点E,AB边上有一点F,线段CF与BD相交于点M
3.备用图是一个与图2类似的等边三角形,有射线BD、线段CF等相关元素
DescriptionEN:
1. Figure 1 shows a △ABC with point D on side AB and point E on side AC. A line CF ∥ AB is drawn through point C, intersecting the extension of DE at point F, where DE = EF.

3. The backup figure is an equilateral triangle similar to Figure 2, containing elements such as ray BD and segment CF.

AnswerCN: (1) CH 的长为 2;(2)直线 EG 与平面 PDN 所成角的正弦值为 \\frac{2\\sqrt{186}}{31}​​.
AnswerEN: (1) The length of CH is 2; (2) The sine of the angle between the straight line EG and the plane PDN is \(\frac{2\sqrt{186}}{31}\).

QuestionCN:
如图,已知点A为⊙O外一点,过A作⊙O的切线与⊙O相切于点P,连接PO并延长至圆上一点B,连接AB交⊙O于点C,连接OA交⊙O于点D,连接DP且∠OAP=∠DPA.(1)求证:PO=PD.(2)若AC=√3,求⊙O的半径.

[注意]本题含有证明题和解答题，证明题不作答，仅返回解答题的答案
QuestionEN:
As shown in the figure, point \( A \) is outside the circle \( \odot O \). A tangent line from \( A \) touches \( \odot O \) at point \( P \). Extend \( PO \) to intersect the circle again at point \( B \). Connect \( AB \), which intersects \( \odot O \) at point \( C \). Connect \( OA \), which intersects \( \odot O \) at point \( D \). Connect \( DP \), and it is given that \( \angle OAP = \angle DPA \).  

(1) Prove: \( PO = PD \).  
(2) If \( AC = \sqrt{3} \), find the radius of \( \odot O \).  

[Note] This problem includes both a proof and a calculation. Only the answer to the calculation part should be returned.

QuestionCN: 1.如图,在淮河的右岸边有一座高楼AB,左岸边有一坡度i=1:√2的山坡CF,点C与点B在同一水平面上,CF与AB在同一平面内.某数学兴趣小组为了测量极AB的高度,在坡底C处测得楼顶A的仰角为45°)然后沿坡面CF上行了20√3米到达点D处,D在水平面上的投影为点E,此时在D处测得楼顶A的仰角恰好等于∠DCE,求楼AB的高度.(结果保留整数)(参考数据√2≈1.414)
QuestionEN: 1. As shown in the figure, on the right bank of the Huai River stands a tall building AB, while on the left bank there is a slope CF with a gradient \( i = 1 : \sqrt{2} \). Points C and B are at the same horizontal level, and CF lies in the same plane as AB. A mathematics interest group aimed to measure the height of building AB. At the base of the slope, point C, they measured the angle of elevation to the top of the building, point A, as \( 45^\circ \). They then ascended 20\( \sqrt{3} \) meters along the slope CF to reach point D, whose horizontal projection is point E. At point D, the angle of elevation to point A was found to be exactly equal to \( \angle DCE \). Determine the height of building AB. (Round the result to the nearest integer.) (Reference data: \( \sqrt{2} \approx 1.414 \))
AnswerEN: The height of building AB is approximately 137 meters.

QuestionCN:
在图1的直角梯形ABCD中,\(\angleADC\)=\(90^{\circ}\),AB//CD,AB=2CD,AB=\(\sqrt{2}\)AD,AC与BD相交于点M.现以AC为折痕把\(\triangleADC\)折起,使点D到达点P的位置,得到如图2所示的空间几何体,点Q为PB上的动点.
(1)证明:平面ACQ⊥平面PBM;
(2)若PB=\(\frac{\sqrt{30}}{6}\)AB,PQ=\(\lambda\)PB(0<\(\lambda\)<1),当平面ACQ与平面PBC夹角的余弦值为\(\frac{3\sqrt{65}}{65}\)时,求\(\lambda\)的值.
[注意]本题含有证明题和解答题，证明题不作答，仅返回解答题的答案
QuestionEN:
In the right trapezoid ABCD shown in Figure 1, \(\angle ADC = 90^{\circ}\), AB // CD, AB = 2CD, AB = \(\sqrt{2}\) AD, and AC intersects BD at point M. Now, using AC as the crease, fold \(\triangle ADC\) so that point D reaches the position of point P, resulting in the spatial geometry shown in Figure 2, where point Q is a moving point on PB.  

(1) Prove: The plane ACQ is perpendicular to the plane PBM;  

(2) If PB = \(\frac{\sqrt{30}}{6}\) AB, PQ = \(\lambda\) PB (\(0 < \lambda < 1\)), and when the cosine of the angle between the plane ACQ and the plane PBC is \(\frac{3\sqrt{65}}{65}\), find the value of \(\lambda\).  

[Note] This problem includes both a proof question and a solution question. The proof question is not to be answered; only the solution to the problem is to be returned.

QuestionCN:
问题提出:(1)如图①,在等边△ABC中,AB=9,D为BC三等分点(BD<CD),连接AD,在AD右侧作∠ADE=60°.求AE的长
问题解决：(2)如图②,在矩形场地ABCD中,AB=300米,BC=400米,AC为对角线,现在要在BC边上设置一个门,在AC上安装一个扫描仪器,该扫描仪的范围为a(即∠BEF=a),经过测试将扫描范围设置为sina=3/5时,效果最佳,以A,F,C.D四点为顶点搭建一个帐篷,则将扫描仅E放置距离C处多长距离时,四边形AFCD的面积最大,最大面积为多少
QuestionEN:
Problem Statement: (1) As shown in Figure ①, in an equilateral △ABC with AB=9, D is a trisection point of BC (BD<CD). Connect AD, and construct ∠ADE=60° to the right of AD. Find the length of AE.  

Problem Solution: (2) As shown in Figure ②, in a rectangular field ABCD with AB=300 meters and BC=400 meters, AC is the diagonal. Now, a gate is to be set on side BC, and a scanning device is to be installed on AC. The scanning range of the device is a (i.e., ∠BEF=a). After testing, it is found that setting the scanning range to sina=3/5 yields the optimal performance. A tent is to be constructed with vertices A, F, C, and D. How far from point C should the scanning device E be placed to maximize the area of quadrilateral AFCD, and what is the maximum area?
DescriptionEN:
1. Figure ① shows an equilateral triangle ABC, labeled with AB=9. There is a point D on side BC, connected to AD and DE.  
2. Figure ② shows a rectangular field ABCD, labeled with AB=300 meters and BC=400 meters. AC is the diagonal, with point F marked on BC and point E marked on AC. The angle ∠BEF is denoted by α.  

【Handwritten】  
1. The figure includes some handwritten mathematical derivations, such as ∠C₁ + ∠C₂ = 180° - 60° = 120°, etc.  
2. In Figure ②, CA is extended to point G and connected to GB.
AnswerCN: (1)AE的长为7;(2)将扫描仪E放置距离C处320米时,四边形AFCD的面积最大,最大面积为98400平方米.
AnswerEN: (1) The length of AE is 7; (2) When scanner E is placed 320 meters away from point C, the area of quadrilateral AFCD reaches its maximum, with a maximum area of 98,400 square meters.

QuestionCN:
在△ABC中,∠C=90°,AC=10√3cm,BC=30cm,点D在BC上,CD=10cm,现有两个动点P、Q分别从点A和点B同时出发,其中点P以√3cm/s沿AC向终点C移动;点Q以4cms的速度沿BC向终点C移动,谁先到达终点,运动随之停止,过点P作PE∥BC交AD于点E,联结EQ动点运动时间为x秒.
(1) 当点Q从点B运动到点C的过程中,设\(\triangle EDQ\)的面积为\(y(cm^2)\),求y与x的函数关系式,并写出x的取值范围;(2) 在运动过程中,若\(S_{\triangle ABC}:S_{\triangle QD}=25:2\),求x的值;(3) 当x为何值时,\(\triangle EDQ\)为直角三角形.
QuestionEN:
In △ABC, ∠C=90°, AC=10√3 cm, BC=30 cm, point D lies on BC with CD=10 cm. There are two moving points P and Q starting simultaneously from points A and B, respectively. Point P moves along AC toward the endpoint C at a speed of √3 cm/s, while point Q moves along BC toward the endpoint C at a speed of 4 cm/s. The movement stops as soon as either point reaches its endpoint. Through point P, a line PE ∥ BC is drawn to intersect AD at point E, and EQ is connected. The movement time of the points is x seconds.  

(1) During the process of point Q moving from point B to point C, let the area of \(\triangle EDQ\) be \(y(cm^2)\). Find the functional relationship between y and x, and write the range of x.  

(2) During the movement, if the ratio \(S_{\triangle ABC}:S_{\triangle QD}=25:2\), find the value of x.  

(3) For what value of x will \(\triangle EDQ\) be a right-angled triangle?
DescriptionCN:
1.有两个三角形几何图形,标注了点A、B、C、D、E、P、Q.
2.左侧图中,三角形ABC,P在AC边上,Q、D在BC边上,AD上有一点E,连接EQ.
DescriptionEN:
1. There are two geometric triangle figures, with points A, B, C, D, E, P, Q labeled.  
2. In the left figure, triangle ABC has point P on side AC, points Q and D on side BC, point E on AD, and segment EQ is connected.

QuestionCN:
如图⊙O的半径为R,在其内接锐角三角形ABC中,∠A,∠B.∠C所对边的长分别是a,b,c.(1)求证a/sinA=b/sinBB=c/sinC=2R
(2)若∠A=60°∠C=45°,BC=4√3,利用(1)的结论求AB的长和SinB值

(2) Given \( \angle A = 60^\circ \), \( \angle C = 45^\circ \), and \( BC = 4\sqrt{3} \), use the conclusion from (1) to find the length of \( AB \) and the value of \( \sin B \).  

[Note] This problem includes both a proof and a solution. Only the solution part is to be answered.

QuestionCN: 如图19-2-39,直线l_1:y=-4/3x+4与y轴交于点A,与直线l_2:y=4/5x+4/5交于点B,且直线l2与x轴交于点C,求△ABC的面积.
QuestionEN: As shown in Figure 19-2-39, the straight line \( l_1: y = -\frac{4}{3}x + 4 \) intersects the y-axis at point A, and intersects the straight line \( l_2: y = \frac{4}{5}x + \frac{4}{5} \) at point B. Moreover, the line \( l_2 \) intersects the x-axis at point C. Find the area of \( \triangle ABC \).
DescriptionEN:
1. Cartesian coordinate plane  
2. Intersection point A of line l₁ and the y-axis  
3. Intersection point B of line l₂ and line l₁  
4. Intersection point C of line l₂ and the x-axis

QuestionCN:
24.某国内的研究所研制了一种新药,在试验药效时发现,成人按规定剂量服用后,检测到从第5分钟起每分中血液中的含药量增加0.2微克,第100分钟达列最高,接着开始衰退,血液中含药量y(微克)与时间x(分钟)的函数关系如图,并发现衰退时y与x成反比例函数关系.
(1)a=__,
(2)当5≤x≤100时,y与x之间的函数关系式为__;当x>100时,y与x之间的函数关系式为__;
(3)如果每毫升血液中含药量不低于10微克时是有效的,求出一次服药后的有效时间多久?
QuestionEN:
24. A domestic research institute developed a new drug. During the efficacy test, it was found that after adults took the prescribed dose, the drug concentration in the blood increased by 0.2 micrograms per minute starting from the 5th minute, reaching its peak at the 100th minute, after which it began to decline. The functional relationship between the drug concentration \( y \) (micrograms) in the blood and time \( x \) (minutes) is shown in the figure, and it was discovered that during the decline phase, \( y \) is inversely proportional to \( x \).  
(1) \( a = \) \_\_ ,  
(2) When \( 5 \leq x \leq 100 \), the functional relationship between \( y \) and \( x \) is \_\_ ; when \( x > 100 \), the functional relationship between \( y \) and \( x \) is \_\_ ;  
(3) If a drug concentration of at least 10 micrograms per milliliter in the blood is considered effective, determine the duration of effectiveness after a single dose.
AnswerEN:
(1)19  
(2)$5 \leq x \leq 100$, $y = 0.2 \times (x - 5)$; $x > 100$, $y = \frac{1900}{x}$  
(3)The effective duration after a single dose is 135 minutes.

DescriptionEN:
1. A circle  
2. Inside the circle, there is a symmetric '工'-shaped figure about the center  
3. The '工'-shape consists of three rectangles of equal width: horizontal, vertical, and horizontal  
4. The center of the circle is marked as O  
5. Points A and B lie on the circle, and the lines connecting the center O to A and B form an angle ∠AOB, labeled as $2\alpha$  
6. There is a line segment connecting points A and B

AnswerEN:
(1) $S = 2AB \cdot BC + \left(\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}\right) AB \cdot BC = \left(4 + \frac{2\sqrt{3}}{3}\right) R^2 \left(\sin \alpha \cos \alpha - \frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} \sin^2 \alpha\right), \alpha \in \left(0, \frac{\pi}{3}\right)$  
(2) When $\alpha = \frac{\pi}{6}$, $S$ reaches its maximum value of $\frac{1 + 2\sqrt{3}}{3} R^2$.

QuestionCN: 中国的探月工程激发了同学们对太空的兴趣．某晚,淇淇在家透过窗户的最高点P恰好看到一颗星星,此时淇淇距窗户的水平距离BQ=4m,仰角为α;淇淇向前走了3m后到达点D,透过点P恰好看到月亮,仰角为β,如图是示意图．已知,淇淇的眼睛与水平地面BQ的距离AB=CD=1.6m,点P到BQ的距离PQ=2.6m,AC的延长线交PQ于点E．(注：图中所有点均在同一平面)(1)求β的大小及tanα的值;(2)求CP的长及sin∠APC的值．
如图所示,一折射率为\\sqrt{3}​的材料制作的三棱镜,其横截面为等腰三角形ABC,∠A为120°,BC边长为l,AB面外层涂有不透明的反光物质,一束宽度为l/2的平行光垂直于BC面射向三棱镜,光束的右边界恰好过BC边的中点D.不考虑光束在三棱镜内部AC面的反射.(1)通过计算说明光线在三棱镜内部传播过程中在BC面是否有光线射出;(2)求光束从三棱镜出射后的方向及出射后光束的宽度.
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, a prism made of a material with refractive index \\sqrt{3} has a cross-section shaped like an isosceles triangle ABC, where ∠A is 120°, and the length of side BC is l. The AB surface is coated with an opaque reflective material. A parallel beam of light with a width of l/2 is incident perpendicularly onto the BC surface, with the right boundary of the beam恰好 passing through the midpoint D of side BC. The reflection of the beam at the internal AC surface is neglected. (1) Determine whether any light exits through the BC surface during propagation inside the prism by calculation; (2) Find the direction of the beam after exiting the prism and the width of the beam after exiting.
DescriptionCN:
1.展示了一个等腰三角形三棱镜ABC,∠A为120°
2.有一束宽度为l/2的平行光垂直于BC面射向三棱镜,光束右边界过BC边中点D
3.画出了光线在三棱镜内的传播路径及在各面的入射角、折射角等
4.标记了BC、AB、AC边
5.标记了一些角度,如60°等
6.有一些光线的箭头表示光线传播方向
DescriptionEN:
1. An isosceles triangular prism ABC is shown, with ∠A being 120°  
2. A parallel beam of light with a width of \( \frac{l}{2} \) is incident perpendicularly on face BC, with the right boundary of the beam passing through the midpoint D of edge BC  
3. The propagation path of the light within the prism, as well as the angles of incidence and refraction at each surface, are illustrated  
4. Edges BC, AB, and AC are labeled  
5. Some angles, such as 60°, are marked  
6. Arrows on some light rays indicate the direction of propagation
AnswerCN:
(1)∠O2​O1​H1​=∠MO1​H1​=∠B=\\frac{180∘−∠A}{2}​=30∘,∠O3​O2​H2​=∠O1​O2​H2​=60∘,在BC面光线发生全反射的临界角α满足sin\alpha=\sqrt{3}/3<sin60°,则光线在BC面发生全反射,不能从BC面射出三棱镜.

(2)∠O2​O3​H3​=30∘,n=\\frac{sin∠NO3​H4}{sin30∘},解得∠NO3​H4​=60∘,所以光束从AC面出射后与BC面平行,由几何关系得出射光束的宽度为d=\\frac{l}{2}⋅tan30∘=\\frac{\\sqrt{3}}{6}l.
AnswerEN:
(1) $\angle O_2O_1H_1 = \angle MO_1H_1 = \angle B = \frac{180^\circ - \angle A}{2} = 30^\circ$, $\angle O_3O_2H_2 = \angle O_1O_2H_2 = 60^\circ$. The critical angle $\alpha$ for total internal reflection on surface BC satisfies $\sin\alpha = \sqrt{3}/3 < \sin60^\circ$, so the light undergoes total internal reflection on surface BC and cannot exit the prism through BC.

(2) $\angle O_2O_3H_3 = 30^\circ$, $n = \frac{\sin\angle NO_3H_4}{\sin30^\circ}$. Solving gives $\angle NO_3H_4 = 60^\circ$, so the beam exiting surface AC is parallel to surface BC. From geometric relations, the width of the exiting beam is $d = \frac{l}{2} \cdot \tan30^\circ = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{6}l$.

QuestionCN: 如图,已知四面体PABC的棱长均为6,棱PA,PB,PC的中点分别为D,E,F,用平面DEF截四面体PABC,得到三棱台DEF-ABC.(I)求三棱台DEF-ABC的体积;(Ⅱ)若M为棱BC上的动点,求EM+MA的最小值,并求取最小值时线段BM的长度.
AnswerCN: (Ⅰ)三棱台DEF−ABC的体积为\\frac{63\\sqrt{2}}{4}​​;(Ⅱ)EM+MA的最小值为3\\sqrt{7}​,此时BM的长度为2.
AnswerEN: (I) The volume of the triangular prism $DEF-ABC$ is $\frac{63\sqrt{2}}{4}$; (II) The minimum value of $EM + MA$ is $3\sqrt{7}$, and the length of $BM$ at this point is $2$.

QuestionEN:
Here are the tickets for two different types of trains ("Dxxx" represents an electric multiple unit (EMU), and "Gxxx" represents a high-speed rail (HSR)).  

(1) Based on the information on the tickets, fill in the blanks: The EMU and the HSR are traveling ____ (fill in "in opposite directions" or "in the same direction"), and the EMU departs ____ hours earlier than the HSR.  

(2) Given that the average speeds of the EMU and the HSR are 200 km/h and 300 km/h respectively, and the lengths of the two trains are negligible, the HSR arrives 1 hour earlier than the EMU. Find the distance between cities A and B.  

(3) Under the conditions in (2), determine how many hours after the HSR departs the two trains are first 100 km apart.
AnswerCN: (1)同向,1;(2)A、B两地之间的路程为1200千米;(3)高铁出发1或3或4.5小时后两车首次相距的路程为100km.
AnswerEN: (1) Same direction, 1; (2) The distance between points A and B is 1200 kilometers; (3) The first time the distance between the two vehicles reaches 100 km is 1, 3, or 4.5 hours after the high-speed train departs.

QuestionEN:

(1) If \(B'D = AD\), prove: \(B'A \perp B'C\); (2) If the size of the dihedral angle \(B'-AM-D\) is \(120^\circ\), find the sine of the angle between plane \(DAB'\) and plane \(DCB'\).  
[Note] This problem includes a proof question and a solution question. The proof question is not to be answered; only the solution to the problem is returned.

DescriptionEN:
1. Figure ① shows a trapezoid ABCD with point M lying on segment BC.  
2. Figure ② depicts the three-dimensional shape formed by folding △BAM along AM, featuring point B' and presenting a combination of a triangular pyramid and a trapezoid.

QuestionCN:
人的性格可以大体分为"外向型和"内向型"两种,树人中学为了了解这两种性格特征与人的性别是否存在关联,采用简单随机抽样的方法抽取90名学生,得到如下数据:
        外向型  内向型
男性  45  15
女性  20  10
(1)以上述统计结果的频率估计概率,从该校男生中随机抽取2人、女生中随机抽取1人担任志愿者,设这三人中性格外向型的人数为X,求x的数学期望,
(2)对表格中的数据,依据α=0.1的独立性检验,可以得出独立性检验的结论是这两种性格特征与人的性别没有关联,如果将表格中的所有数据都扩大为原来10倍,在相同的检验标准下,再用独立性检验推断这两种性格特征与人的性别之间的关联性,得到的结论是否一致?请说明理由,
QuestionEN:
Human personalities can be broadly categorized into two types: "extroverted" and "introverted." In order to investigate whether these personality traits are associated with gender, Shuren High School conducted a simple random sampling of 90 students and obtained the following data:

            Extroverted  Introverted  
Male    45        15  
Female  20        10  

(1) Using the frequencies from the above statistical results to estimate probabilities, 2 male students and 1 female student are randomly selected from the school to serve as volunteers. Let \( X \) be the number of extroverted individuals among these three people. Find the mathematical expectation of \( X \).  

(2) For the data in the table, an independence test at \( \alpha = 0.1 \) leads to the conclusion that these two personality traits are not associated with gender. If all the data in the table are scaled up by a factor of 10, under the same test standard, would the conclusion drawn from the independence test regarding the association between these personality traits and gender remain consistent? Please explain your reasoning.
DescriptionCN: 2.有一个2×2列联表,第一行表头为“外向型”“内向型”,第一列表头为“男性”“女性”,表格数据依次为45、15、20、10
DescriptionEN: 2. There is a 2×2 contingency table with the column headers "Extroverted" and "Introverted" in the first row, and the row headers "Male" and "Female" in the first column. The table data are 45, 15, 20, and 10 in order.
AnswerCN:
(1) X 的数学期望为 \(\frac{13}{6}\).
(2)结论不一致,原数据依据 \(\alpha=0.1\) 的独立性检验得出两种性格特征与人的性别没有关联,数据扩大 10 倍后依据 \(\alpha=0.1\) 的独立性检验得出两种性格特征与人的性别有关联
AnswerEN:
(1) The mathematical expectation of X is \(\frac{13}{6}\).  
(2) The conclusions are inconsistent. The original data, based on an independence test with \(\alpha=0.1\), indicated no association between the two personality traits and human gender. However, after scaling the data by 10 times and performing the same independence test with \(\alpha=0.1\), the results showed an association between the two personality traits and human gender.

QuestionCN:
定义:在平面直角坐标系xOy中,已知点P_1(a,b),P_2(c,b),P1(c,d),这三个点中任意两点间的最小值称为P_1,P_2,P_3的“最佳间距”.例如:如图Z9-5-8,点P1(-1,2),P2(1,2),P3(1,3)的“最佳间距”是1.
(1)理解:点Q_1(2,1),Q_2(4,1),Q_3(4,4)的“最佳间距”是
(2)探究:已知点O(0,0),A(-3,0),B(-3,y).,①若点O,A,B的“最佳间距”是1,则y的值为____.
②点O,A,B的 “最佳间距” 的最大值为 \(\underline{\quad}\);(3)迁移：当点\(O(0,0)\),\(E(m,0)\),\(P(m,-2m + 1)\)的 “最佳间距” 取到最大值时,求此时点P的坐标.【提示：把(2)②的探究结论迁移过来】
QuestionEN:
Definition: In the plane rectangular coordinate system \( xOy \), given the points \( P_1(a,b) \), \( P_2(c,b) \), and \( P_3(c,d) \), the minimum distance between any two of these three points is called the "optimal spacing" of \( P_1 \), \( P_2 \), and \( P_3 \). For example: As shown in Figure Z9-5-8, the "optimal spacing" of the points \( P_1(-1,2) \), \( P_2(1,2) \), and \( P_3(1,3) \) is 1.  

(1) Understanding: The "optimal spacing" of the points \( Q_1(2,1) \), \( Q_2(4,1) \), and \( Q_3(4,4) \) is \_\_\_\_\_.  

(2) Exploration: Given the points \( O(0,0) \), \( A(-3,0) \), and \( B(-3,y) \).  
① If the "optimal spacing" of \( O \), \( A \), and \( B \) is 1, then the value of \( y \) is \_\_\_\_\_.  
② The maximum value of the "optimal spacing" of \( O \), \( A \), and \( B \) is \(\underline{\quad}\).  

(3) Application: When the "optimal spacing" of the points \( O(0,0) \), \( E(m,0) \), and \( P(m,-2m + 1) \) reaches its maximum, determine the coordinates of point \( P \). [Hint: Apply the conclusion from part (2)②.]
DescriptionEN: 1. With examples, given points \( P_1(-1,2) \), \( P_2(1,2) \), and \( P_3(1,3) \).
AnswerEN:
(1) 2  
(2) ① +1 or -1  
    ② 3  
(3) The coordinates of point P are $\left(\frac{1}{3}, \frac{1}{3}\right)$ or $(1, -1)$.

QuestionCN: 如图,已知点A是双曲线y=2/x在第一象限的分支上的一个动点,连结AO并延长交另一分支X于点B,以AB为斜边作等腰直角△ABC,点C在第四象限.随着点A的运动,点C的位置也不断变化,但点C始终在双曲线y=k/x(k<0)上运动,则k的值是____.
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, point \( A \) is a moving point on the branch of the hyperbola \( y = \frac{2}{x} \) in the first quadrant. Connecting \( AO \) and extending it intersects the other branch at point \( B \). An isosceles right triangle \( \triangle ABC \) is constructed with \( AB \) as the hypotenuse, and point \( C \) lies in the fourth quadrant. As point \( A \) moves, the position of point \( C \) continuously changes, but \( C \) always moves along the hyperbola \( y = \frac{k}{x} \) (\( k < 0 \)). The value of \( k \) is ____.

QuestionCN: 为提升居民的居住环境,许多小区采用高层、小高层结合的模式建造.如图,某小区有前后两栋楼分别是高层AB和小高层CD,两栋楼的楼间距BD为40米,当小明站在高层楼顶点A处时,测得对面小高层楼顶C点的俯角为45°,测得对面小高层楼底D点的俯角为58°,已知小高层CD每层高度为3米,且AB⊥BD,CD⊥BD.(参考数据:sin58°≈0.85,cos58°≈0.53,tan58°≈1.60结果精确到1米)(1)求该小区高层AB的高度;(2)求该小区小高层有多少层?
QuestionEN:
To improve the living environment for residents, many residential communities adopt a construction model combining high-rise and mid-rise buildings. As shown in the figure, a community has two buildings: a high-rise building AB and a mid-rise building CD. The distance between the two buildings, BD, is 40 meters. When Xiao Ming stands at the top point A of the high-rise building, he measures the angle of depression to the top point C of the mid-rise building as 45° and the angle of depression to the base point D of the mid-rise building as 58°. The height of each floor of the mid-rise building CD is 3 meters, and AB⊥BD, CD⊥BD. (Reference data: sin58°≈0.85, cos58°≈0.53, tan58°≈1.60. Results are rounded to the nearest meter.)  

(1) Find the height of the high-rise building AB in the community.  
(2) Determine how many floors the mid-rise building CD has.
DescriptionCN:
1.标注有A、B、C、D四个点的几何图形
2.线段AB和线段CD垂直于线段BD
3.从点A引出两条虚线分别指向点C和点D
4.标有45°和58°两个角度
5.标有“第22题图”字样
DescriptionEN:
1. A geometric figure labeled with four points A, B, C, D  
2. Line segments AB and CD are perpendicular to segment BD  
3. Two dashed lines are drawn from point A to points C and D respectively  
4. Angles labeled as 45° and 58°  
5. Marked with "Figure for Question 22"
AnswerEN: AB is approximately 64 meters, and the low-rise building has 8 floors.

QuestionCN: 回纹,因为其形状像汉字中的“回”字,所以又称之为回字纹,如图1.回纹图案作为一种古老而又丰富多变的装饰图案,自古以来便是中国文化的重要组成部分,回纹图案以简洁的图案和深远的意义,深受人们的喜爱.如图2是小明在网格纸中画出的回纹图案,若网格纸中小正方形的边长为1cm,则小明绘制的回纹图案的线段总长为____cm
QuestionEN: The fret pattern, also known as the "回" pattern due to its resemblance to the Chinese character "回," is illustrated in Figure 1. As an ancient and versatile decorative motif, the fret pattern has long been an integral part of Chinese culture. With its simple design and profound meaning, it is deeply cherished by people. Figure 2 shows a fret pattern drawn by Xiaoming on grid paper. If the side length of each small square in the grid is 1 cm, then the total length of the line segments in Xiaoming's fret pattern is ____ cm.
DescriptionCN:
1.图1是回纹图案;
2.图2是小明在网格纸中画出的回纹图案;
DescriptionEN:
1. Figure 1 is a fret pattern;  
2. Figure 2 shows the fret pattern drawn by Xiaoming on grid paper.

QuestionCN: 如图,这是一个供滑板爱好者使用的U形池,该U形池可以看作是一个长方体去掉一个半圆柱而成的,中间可供滑行部分的截面是半径为3m的半圆弧,该部分的边缘AB=CD=45m,点E在CD上CE=5m.若一滑行爱好者从点A滑行到点E,则他滑行的最短路C程是多少?(边缘部分的厚度可以忽略不计,π取整数3
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, this is a U-shaped pool for skateboarders. The pool can be regarded as a cuboid with a semi-cylinder removed. The cross-section of the central skating area is a semicircular arc with a radius of 3 m, and the edges of this part are AB = CD = 45 m. Point E is on CD with CE = 5 m. If a skateboarder skates from point A to point E, what is the shortest distance he can travel? (The thickness of the edge can be ignored, and π is taken as the integer 3.)
DescriptionCN:
1.是一个立体形状图	
2.展示了一个类似U形池的结构	
3.标注了边缘的点A、B、C、D、E	
4.点E在CD上
DescriptionEN:
1. It is a three-dimensional shape diagram  
2. Shows a structure similar to a U-shaped pool  
3. Marks the edge points A, B, C, D, E  
4. Point E is located on CD
AnswerCN: 他滑行的最短距离大约是41m.
AnswerEN: The minimum distance he glides is approximately 41 m.

QuestionCN: 如图1,“球缺”是指一个球被平面所截后剩下的部分,截得的圆面叫做球缺的底,垂直于截面的直径被截得的一段叫做球缺的高,已知球缺的体积公式为V=π/3(3R-h)h^2,其中R是球的半径,h是球缺的高.某航空制造公司研发一种新的机械插件,其左右两部分为圆柱,中间为球切除两个相同的“球缺”剩余的部分,制作尺寸如图2所示(单位：cm).则该机械插件中间部分的体积约为(π≈3)
QuestionEN:
As shown in Figure 1, a "spherical segment" refers to the remaining part of a sphere after being cut by a plane. The circular surface obtained from the cut is called the base of the spherical segment, and the segment of the diameter perpendicular to the cutting plane intercepted by the cut is called the height of the spherical segment. The volume formula of the spherical segment is given by \( V = \frac{\pi}{3}(3R - h)h^2 \), where \( R \) is the radius of the sphere and \( h \) is the height of the spherical segment.  

An aviation manufacturing company is developing a new mechanical component, whose left and right parts are cylinders and the middle part is the remaining portion of a sphere after removing two identical "spherical segments." The production dimensions are shown in Figure 2 (unit: cm). The volume of the middle part of this mechanical component is approximately (with \( \pi \approx 3 \)):
DescriptionCN:
1.图1为球缺示意图,标注有球的半径R、球缺的高h、球心O;
2.图2为机械插件中间部分的示意图,是一个球体,标注有球体直径58cm,球体左右两侧各有一个圆柱,圆柱宽5cm,圆柱高14cm;
DescriptionEN:
1. Figure 1 shows a schematic diagram of a spherical cap, labeled with the sphere's radius \( R \), the height of the spherical cap \( h \), and the sphere's center \( O \);  
2. Figure 2 shows a schematic diagram of the middle part of a mechanical plug, which is a sphere labeled with a diameter of 58 cm. On both the left and right sides of the sphere, there is a cylinder, each with a width of 5 cm and a height of 14 cm;

QuestionCN:
已知函数y=f(x)=√3cos(π/4x+φ)(|φ|<π)的部分图象如图所示,M,N分别是函数图象的最高点和最低点,记∠MON=θ,则下列结论正确的是(    )
A. 函数\(f(x)\)的单调递增区间为\([3 + 8k,7 + 8k],k\in Z\)B. 函数\(f(x)\)图象的对称中心为\((1 + 4k,0),k\in Z\)C.\(\varphi=\frac{3\pi}{4}\)D.\(\tan(\theta - \varphi)= - 2 - \sqrt{3}\)
QuestionEN:
Given the partial graph of the function \( y = f(x) = \sqrt{3} \cos\left(\frac{\pi}{4}x + \varphi\right) \) (\( |\varphi| < \pi \)) as shown, \( M \) and \( N \) are the highest and lowest points on the graph, respectively. Let \( \angle MON = \theta \). Which of the following conclusions is correct? (    )

A. The increasing intervals of the function \( f(x) \) are \( [3 + 8k, 7 + 8k], k \in \mathbb{Z} \).  
B. The symmetry centers of the graph of \( f(x) \) are \( (1 + 4k, 0), k \in \mathbb{Z} \).  
C. \( \varphi = \frac{3\pi}{4} \).  
D. \( \tan(\theta - \varphi) = -2 - \sqrt{3} \).

QuestionCN: 如图,点F(1,0)为椭圆x^2/4+y^2/3=1的右焦点,过F且垂直于x轴的直线与椭圆E相交于CD两点(C在D的上方),设点A、B是椭圆E上位于直线CD两侧的动点,且满足∠ACD=∠BCD,试问直线AB的斜率是否为定值,请说明理由.
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, the point \( F(1,0) \) is the right focus of the ellipse \( \frac{x^2}{4} + \frac{y^2}{3} = 1 \). The line passing through \( F \) and perpendicular to the \( x \)-axis intersects the ellipse \( E \) at points \( C \) and \( D \) (\( C \) is above \( D \)). Let points \( A \) and \( B \) be moving points on the ellipse \( E \) located on opposite sides of the line \( CD \), satisfying \( \angle ACD = \angle BCD \). Determine whether the slope of the line \( AB \) is a constant value, and provide reasoning.
AnswerEN: The slope of line AB is a constant value \(\frac{1}{2}\).

QuestionCN:
如图,四棱锥P－ABCD的底面为菱形,∠DAB=90°,PB=PC=√3,(1)证明：PD⊥AD;(2)若AD=2,PD=1,求二面角A-PD-C的正弦值.
[注意]本题含有证明题和解答题，证明题不作答，仅返回解答题的答案
QuestionEN:
As shown in the figure, the base of the quadrilateral pyramid \( P-ABCD \) is a rhombus, with \( \angle DAB = 90^\circ \), \( PB = PC = \sqrt{3} \). (1) Prove: \( PD \perp AD \); (2) If \( AD = 2 \), \( PD = 1 \), find the sine of the dihedral angle \( A-PD-C \).  
[Note] This problem contains both a proof and a solution part. Only return the answer to the solution part, not the proof.    
\(\boxed{\dfrac{2\sqrt{5}}{5}}\)
DescriptionCN:
1.四棱锥P-ABCD;
2.顶点为P,底面三角形为ABCD;
DescriptionEN:
1. A quadrilateral pyramid \( P-ABCD \);  
2. With vertex \( P \) and base quadrilateral \( ABCD \);
AnswerEN: (2) The sine of the dihedral angle A−PD−C is \(\frac{\sqrt{6}}{3}\).

QuestionCN:
光明加工厂采用成批生产方式生产A产品,A产品的生产过程为：毛坯车间→机加工车间→装配车间.十月份装配车间的累计出产到200号,平均日需产量为4台.各车间的生产批量相同,生产周期及保险期如下题36表所示(单位：天).

题36表
生产车间    生产周期    保险期
毛坯车间    7    3
机加工车间  8    2
装配车间    6    0

要求：
(1)分别确定装配车间、机加工车间、毛坯车间的出产提前期及投入提前期;
(2)分别确定机加工、毛坯车间的出产累计号及投入累计号;
(3)累计编号法适用于制定单件小批量生产类型的生产作业计划吗?为什么?
QuestionEN:
The Guangming Processing Factory adopts batch production to manufacture Product A. The production process for Product A is as follows: Blanking Workshop → Machining Workshop → Assembly Workshop. By October, the cumulative output of the Assembly Workshop has reached No. 200, with an average daily demand of 4 units. The production batch sizes for each workshop are the same, and the production cycles and safety periods are shown in Table 36 below (unit: days).

Table 36  
Production Workshop    Production Cycle    Safety Period  
Blanking Workshop      7                  3  
Machining Workshop    8                  2  
Assembly Workshop     6                  0  

Requirements:  
(1) Determine the production lead time and input lead time for the Assembly Workshop, Machining Workshop, and Blanking Workshop, respectively;  
(2) Determine the cumulative output number and cumulative input number for the Machining Workshop and Blanking Workshop, respectively;  
(3) Is the cumulative numbering method suitable for developing production schedules for small-batch or single-piece production types? Why?

QuestionCN:
如图,有一个转盘被分成6个相同的扇形区域,分别为红、黄、绿、白四种颜色,指针的位置固定,转动转盘后任其自由停止,如果指针指在等分线上,那么重新转动,直至指针指向某个扇形区域内为止.请你回答以下问题:
(1)写出两个随机事件:
(2)写出一个概率为1/3的事件.
QuestionEN:
As shown in the figure, there is a turntable divided into 6 identical扇形 regions, with four colors: red, yellow, green, and white. The pointer's position is fixed. After spinning the turntable, let it come to a stop freely. If the pointer lands on an dividing line, spin it again until the pointer points to a扇形 region. Please answer the following questions:  
(1) Write down two random events:  
(2) Write down an event with a probability of \(\frac{1}{3}\).
AnswerCN:
(1)随机事件一:转动该转盘一次,指针指在红色区域内;随机事件二:转动该转盘一次,指针指在绿色区域内.(言之有理即可);
(2)转动该转盘一次,指针指在红色区域内的概率为1/3(或转动该转盘一次,指针指在黄色区域内的概率为1/3).
AnswerEN:
(1) Random event one: Spin the wheel once, and the pointer stops in the red area; Random event two: Spin the wheel once, and the pointer stops in the green area. (Any reasonable answer is acceptable);
(2) The probability that the pointer stops in the red area after spinning the wheel once is $\frac{1}{3}$ (or the probability that the pointer stops in the yellow area after spinning the wheel once is $\frac{1}{3}$).

QuestionCN:
一家面包房根据以往某种面包的销售记录,绘制了日销售量的频率分布直方图,如图所示.
将日销售量落入各组的频率视为概率,并假设每天的销售量相互独立.
(1)求在未来连续3天里,连续2天的日销售量都不低于100个且另1天的日销售量低于50个的概率;
(2)用X表示在未来3天里日销售量不低于100个的天数,求随机变量X的分布列,均值E(X)及方差D(X).
QuestionEN:
A bakery has drawn a frequency distribution histogram of the daily sales for a certain type of bread based on past sales records, as shown in the figure.  
The frequency of daily sales falling into each group is regarded as the probability, and it is assumed that the daily sales are independent of each other.  

(1) Find the probability that in the next 3 consecutive days, there are 2 consecutive days with daily sales no less than 100 and 1 day with daily sales less than 50.  

(2) Let \( X \) denote the number of days with daily sales no less than 100 in the next 3 days. Determine the probability distribution of the random variable \( X \), as well as its mean \( E(X) \) and variance \( D(X) \).
DescriptionCN:
1.横坐标为日销售量/个,刻度为0、50、100、150、200、250
2.纵坐标为频率/组距,刻度为0.002、0.003、0.004、0.005、0.006
3.有五个矩形柱,第一个矩形柱对应日销售量0-50,高度对应频率/组距为0.003
4.第二个矩形柱对应日销售量50-100,高度对应频率/组距为0.005
5.第三个矩形柱对应日销售量100-150,高度对应频率/组距为0.006
6.第四个矩形柱对应日销售量150-200,高度对应频率/组距为0.004
7.第五个矩形柱对应日销售量200-250,高度对应频率/组距为0.002
DescriptionEN:
1. The horizontal axis represents daily sales/units, with tick marks at 0, 50, 100, 150, 200, 250  
2. The vertical axis represents frequency/class width, with tick marks at 0.002, 0.003, 0.004, 0.005, 0.006  
3. There are five rectangular bars: the first corresponds to daily sales 0-50, with a height representing frequency/class width of 0.003  
4. The second bar corresponds to daily sales 50-100, with a height representing frequency/class width of 0.005  
5. The third bar corresponds to daily sales 100-150, with a height representing frequency/class width of 0.006  
6. The fourth bar corresponds to daily sales 150-200, with a height representing frequency/class width of 0.004  
7. The fifth bar corresponds to daily sales 200-250, with a height representing frequency/class width of 0.002
AnswerEN:
(1) 0.108;  
(2) The probability distribution is as follows:  
X 0 1 2 3  
P 0.064 0.288 0.432 0.216  
Mean \(E(X) = 1.8\), Variance \(D(X) = 0.72\)

QuestionCN: 在《算法统宗》中有一道"荡秋千"的问题:"平地秋千未起,踏板一尺离地.送行二步与人齐,五尺人高曾记.仕女佳人争蹴,终朝笑语欢嬉.良工高士素好奇,算出索长有几."此问题可理解为:如图,有一架秋千,当它静止时,踏板离地的垂直高度AB为1尺,将它往前水平推送10尺,即A'C=10尺时,秋千的踏板离地的垂直高度A'D就和身高5尺的人一样高.若运动过程中秋千的绳索始终拉得很直,则绳索OA的长为____.
QuestionEN:
In *The Comprehensive Compendium of Algorithms*, there is a problem about "swinging on a swing":  
"When the swing on level ground is at rest, the footboard is one chi above the ground. Pushing it forward horizontally by two steps (10 chi), the footboard reaches the height of a person who is five chi tall. Ladies and beauties compete to kick it, laughing and playing all day long. Skilled craftsmen and scholars, ever curious, calculate the length of the rope."  

This problem can be understood as follows: As shown in the figure, there is a swing. When it is stationary, the vertical height of the footboard above the ground, AB, is 1 chi. When it is pushed forward horizontally by 10 chi (i.e., A'C = 10 chi), the vertical height of the footboard above the ground, A'D, matches the height of a person who is 5 chi tall. If the rope OA remains taut throughout the motion, then the length of the rope OA is ____.

To increase the villagers' income, a village planted a batch of apple trees. To better market the produce, 100 apples were randomly picked from the trees, and their masses (in grams) were found to be uniformly distributed in the interval [150, 300]. A frequency distribution histogram was plotted as shown in the figure:  
(1) Using proportional stratified random sampling, 5 apples were randomly selected from those with masses in the intervals [175, 200) and [200, 225). Then, 2 apples were randomly chosen from these 5. Find the probability that both apples have a mass less than 200 grams.  
(2) Using the midpoint of each interval to represent the average level of the data, it is known that there are approximately 50,000 apples per mu awaiting sale. An e-commerce company proposed two acquisition plans:  
A. All apples are purchased at 4 yuan per kilogram;  
B. Apples below 225 grams are purchased at 0.8 yuan each, while apples weighing 225 grams or above are purchased at 1 yuan each. Calculate and determine the plan that yields the highest income for the village.

QuestionCN:
A,B 两个投资项目的利润率分别为随机变量X_1和X_2．根据市场分析,X_1和X_2的分布列分别如下表.
X_1 5% 10%
P 0.8 0.2
X_2 2% 8% 12%
P 0.2 0.5 0.3
(1) 在 A,B 两个项目上各投资 100 万元,Y_1和Y_2分别表示投资项目A和B所获得的利润,求方差D(Y_1),D(Y_2);
(2) 将x(0≤x≤100)万元投资A项目,100-x万元投资B项目,f(x)表示投资 A 项目所得利润的方差与投资 B 项目所得利润的方差的和．求f(x)的最小值,并指出x为何值时,f(x)取到最小值．
QuestionEN:
The profit rates of two investment projects A and B are random variables \( X_1 \) and \( X_2 \), respectively. According to market analysis, the probability distributions of \( X_1 \) and \( X_2 \) are given in the following tables.

\[
\begin{array}{c|cc}
X_1 & 5\% & 10\% \\
\hline
P & 0.8 & 0.2 \\
\end{array}
\quad
\begin{array}{c|ccc}
X_2 & 2\% & 8\% & 12\% \\
\hline
P & 0.2 & 0.5 & 0.3 \\
\end{array}
\]

(1) Invest 1 million yuan in projects A and B each, and let \( Y_1 \) and \( Y_2 \) represent the profits obtained from investing in projects A and B, respectively. Find the variances \( D(Y_1) \) and \( D(Y_2) \).

(2) Invest \( x \) (\( 0 \leq x \leq 100 \)) million yuan in project A and \( 100 - x \) million yuan in project B. Let \( f(x) \) denote the sum of the variance of the profit from investing in project A and the variance of the profit from investing in project B. Find the minimum value of \( f(x) \), and determine the value of \( x \) at which \( f(x) \) reaches its minimum.
DescriptionEN:
1. The probability distributions of \( X_1 \) and \( X_2 \) are as follows:

\[
\begin{array}{c|cc}
X_1 & 5\% & 10\% \\
\hline
P & 0.8 & 0.2 \\
\end{array}
\]

\[
\begin{array}{c|ccc}
X_2 & 2\% & 8\% & 12\% \\
\hline
P & 0.2 & 0.5 & 0.3 \\
\end{array}
\]

QuestionCN:
如图,假定所有的分岔口都各有两条新的歧路,并且丢失的羊走每条歧路的可能性都相等.
(1)到第n次分歧时,共有多少条歧路?当羊走过n个三岔路口后,被找到的概率是多少?
(2)当n=5时,派出6个人去找羊,找到羊的概率是多少?
QuestionEN:
As shown in the figure, assume that each fork has two new diverging paths, and the lost sheep has an equal probability of taking any path.  
(1) At the $n$-th fork, how many diverging paths are there in total? What is the probability of finding the sheep after it passes through $n$ forks?  
(2) When $n=5$, if 6 people are sent to search for the sheep, what is the probability of finding it?
AnswerCN: 【答;(1)到第n次分歧时,共有2n条歧路,羊走过n个三岔路口后被找到的概率是\\frac{1}{2n}​;(2)当n=5时,派出6个人去找羊,找到羊的概率是\\frac{32^6-31^6}{32^6}​ .】
AnswerEN: (1) By the nth branching, there are a total of $2^n$ forked paths, and the probability that the sheep is found after passing through $n$ forks is $\frac{1}{2^n}$; (2) When $n=5$, sending out 6 people to search for the sheep, the probability of finding the sheep is $\frac{32^6-31^6}{32^6}$.

QuestionCN: 如图,在Rt△ABC中,AB=3,∠ABC=90°,∠ACB=30°,将△ABC绕点B按顺时针方向旋转,得到△A'BC',点A,C的对应点分别为A',C',D是A'C'的中点,求旋转的过程中,点D到直线AC距离的最大值.
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, in Rt△ABC, \( AB = 3 \), \( \angle ABC = 90^\circ \), \( \angle ACB = 30^\circ \). Rotate △ABC clockwise around point \( B \) to obtain △A'BC', where the corresponding points of \( A \) and \( C \) are \( A' \) and \( C' \) respectively. \( D \) is the midpoint of \( A'C' \). Find the maximum distance from point \( D \) to the line \( AC \) during the rotation.

QuestionCN: 如图,直线EF上有两点A,C,分别引两条射线AB,CD,∠DCF=60°∠EAB=70°,射线AB,CD分别绕点A,C以1度/秒和3度/秒的速度同时顺时针转动,在射线CD转动一周的时间内,使得CD与AB平行的时间为____.
QuestionEN: As shown in the figure, there are two points A and C on the straight line EF. Two rays AB and CD are drawn from A and C respectively, with $\angle DCF = 60^\circ$ and $\angle EAB = 70^\circ$. The rays AB and CD rotate clockwise simultaneously around points A and C at speeds of $1^\circ/\text{second}$ and $3^\circ/\text{second}$ respectively. Within the time it takes for CD to complete one full rotation, the duration during which CD is parallel to AB is ____.

QuestionCN: 如图8、从左向右依次摆放序号分别为1、2、3、…、n的小桶、其中任意相邻的四个小桶所放置的小球数之和相等,则x+y的值为____.
QuestionEN: As shown in Figure 8, small buckets numbered 1, 2, 3, ..., n are arranged from left to right, where the sum of the number of small balls placed in any four adjacent buckets is equal. Then the value of \( x + y \) is \_\_\_\_.

QuestionCN:
设离散型随机变量X的分布列如下: 
X 0 1 2 3
P a 0.4 0.3 0.2 
若离散型随机变量Y满足 Y=3X+1 ,则下列结论正确的有 (    )
A. E(X)=1.6 
B. E(Y)=5.8 
C. D(X)=1.84 
D. D(Y)=7.56
QuestionEN:
Let the probability distribution of the discrete random variable \( X \) be as follows:  
\( X \)  0  1  2  3  
\( P \)  \( a \)  0.4  0.3  0.2  
If the discrete random variable \( Y \) satisfies \( Y = 3X + 1 \), then which of the following conclusions are correct? (    )  
A. \( E(X) = 1.6 \)  
B. \( E(Y) = 5.8 \)  
C. \( D(X) = 1.84 \)  
D. \( D(Y) = 7.56 \)

QuestionCN:
某学生兴趣小组在研究所在学校的学生性别与身高(身高分为低于170cm和不低于170cm)的相关关系时,记事件A=“学生身高不低于170cm”,事件B =“学生为女生“.据该校以往的统计结果显示. P(A)=1/3,P(B)=2/3,P(A|B)=1/6
(1)求P(AB), P(A|\overline{B});
(2)若从该校的其中一个班随机抽取36名学生、依据该校以往的统计结果,完成下列列联表,并依据小概率值α=0.005的独立性检验,分析学生的性别与身高是否不低于 170 cm 有关? 
性别 身高 合计 
2-3 低于 170cm 不低于 170 cm 
女
男
合计
参考公式及数据：χ2=n(ad−bc)^2​/(a+b)(c+d)(a+c)(b+d),n=a+b+c+d . 
a 0.01 0.005 0.001 
χa​ 6.635 7.879 10.828
QuestionEN:
A student interest group was studying the correlation between gender and height (divided into below 170 cm and not below 170 cm) among students at their school. They defined event \( A = \) "student's height is not below 170 cm" and event \( B = \) "student is female". According to the school's historical statistics, \( P(A) = \frac{1}{3} \), \( P(B) = \frac{2}{3} \), and \( P(A|B) = \frac{1}{6} \).  

(1) Find \( P(AB) \) and \( P(A|\overline{B}) \);  
(2) If 36 students are randomly selected from one of the school's classes, based on the historical statistics, complete the following contingency table and perform an independence test at the significance level \( \alpha = 0.005 \) to analyze whether a student's gender is related to their height being not below 170 cm.  

| Gender | Height          | Total |  
|--------|-----------------|-------|  
|        | Below 170 cm    | Not below 170 cm |  
| Female |                 |       |  
| Male   |                 |       |  
| Total  |                 |       |  

Reference formula and data:  
\[ \chi^2 = \frac{n(ad - bc)^2}{(a+b)(c+d)(a+c)(b+d)}, \quad n = a + b + c + d. \]  

\[ \begin{array}{c|ccc}  
\alpha & 0.01 & 0.005 & 0.001 \\  
\hline  
\chi_\alpha & 6.635 & 7.879 & 10.828  
\end{array} \]
DescriptionCN: 1.有一个列联表,表头为“性别”“身高”“合计”,身高下分“低于170cm”“不低于170cm”,性别分“女”“男”“合计”.
DescriptionEN: 1. There is a contingency table with the headers "Gender", "Height", and "Total". Under "Height", there are two categories: "Below 170cm" and "170cm or above". Under "Gender", there are three categories: "Female", "Male", and "Total".
AnswerEN:
(1) $P(AB) = \frac{1}{9}$, $P(A|\overline{B}) = \frac{2}{3}$;  
(2) 20, 4, 24, 4, 8, 12, 24, 12, 36, it is believed that there is an association between students' gender and whether their height is at least 170 cm.

QuestionEN:

D. If the equation \( f(x) = \frac{3}{2} \) has exactly 6 roots in \( (0, m) \), then \( m \in (3\pi, \frac{10\pi}{3}] \)
